title: State of the Mavs with Josh Eberley
itunes:title: State of the Mavs with Josh Eberley
description:
Miles and Jack were pleased to be joined by Spotify Live NBA Host Josh Eberley on the latest episode of Mad Boosties. After discussing whether his Mavs can improve upon last year's impressive playoff run, the trio discussed all the news and notes from a busy Media Day across the league.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
